content.en_US:
The second heaviest fraction obtained from the [[oil refinery|Oil Refinery]] after processing [[crude oil|Crude Oil]]. It is also obtained by [[cracking|Catalytic Cracking Tower]] [[industrial oil|Industrial Oil]] or [[reforming|Reforming]] [[heating oil|Heating Oil]].

Naphtha is used to produce [[gasoline|Gasoline]] in the [[chemical plant|Chemical Plant]] or mixed with aromatic hydrocarbons to produce [[solvent|Solvent]].

Alternatively, it can be [[reformed|Reforming]] to produce [[reformate|Reformate]].
